availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lucien J. Cartwright (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Brother of Milton A. Cartwright)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Allen Cartwright and Adeline Graves Cartwright. Married to Margaret Wadlington Cartwright. Employed by John B. Wall as a farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 377A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 36.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 492A.
KYR-0001-020-0080.
